description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Wisps:
If all the creatures in your party are {RACE_Wisp}s, they have a 25% chance to avoid damage and gain {CONDNAME_BUFF_SHELL} at the start of their turns. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Wisp
